Who We Are?

It was during the college days, the seeds of beginning a startup venture was first sown in to our minds, leading us to gather feedbacks and opinions from the experts. the first choice was ICT to begin a devil company. What better place than , one of the first computer training academies in Kerala since 1990. Ushering us to, devoloping the training academy to a devolopment company. Hence the establishment 'ictodes Pvt. Ltd.'. The finest accomplishment of any business venture is the successful execution and the best team with full of passion and talent paved our way to achieve the very same success. The satisfaction of the clients defines any company. With the quality of service provided by ictcodes, we guarantee to fulfill every requirement of the clientele. To assure this, we provide our clients with a sturdy group of technologists and software professionals, who are prominent in the fields of web, windows and mobile solutions.
